Job Description: Job Description    The successful candidate will be experienced in designing,  building,  testing integrations in a large,  complex enterprise organization. The candidate must possess strong technical skills,  HR business functional knowledge (e.g. HCM,  Payroll,  Recruiting,  Compensation,  etc) and work well with internal stakeholders and external vendors. The candidate will be a disciplined selfstarter working well with business leaders,  functional analysts,  operations teams,  vendors,    and internal I.T. In addition this candidate will understand how to drive value out of the Workday platform by building sustainable integrations,  ensuring data accuracy,  all with a laser focus on data security.
